001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.rabbitmq;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
005import java.net.URI;
006import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
007import java.util.Map;
008import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;
009import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
010import java.util.function.Function;
011
012import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
013
014import com.rabbitmq.client.AMQP.BasicProperties;
015import com.rabbitmq.client.AlreadyClosedException;
016import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel;
017import com.rabbitmq.client.Connection;
018import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory;
019
020import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
021import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent;
022import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput;
023import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
024import io.jstach.rainbowgum.MetaLog;
025import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
026
027/**
028 * RabbitMQ Output that will write publish messages to a given exchange with a given
029 * routing key.
030 */
031public class RabbitMQOutput implements LogOutput {
032
033        private final URI uri;
034
035        private final ConnectionFactory connectionFactory;
036
037        private Connection connection;
038
039        private volatile Channel channel;
040
041        private ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
042
043        private final @Nullable String appId;
044
045        private final String exchange;
046
047        private final Function<LogEvent, String> routingKeyFunction;
048
049        private final String connectionName;
050
051        private final boolean declareExchange;
052
053        private final String exchangeType;
054
055        /**
056         * The rabbitmq URI scheme for configuration.
057         */
058        public final static String URI_SCHEME = "amqp";
059
060        /**
061         * Default exchange.
062         */
063        public final static String DEFAULT_EXCHANGE = "logging";
064
065        /**
066         * Default exchange type for declaration.
067         */
068        public final static String DEFAULT_EXCHANGE_TYPE = "topic";
069
070        RabbitMQOutput(URI uri, ConnectionFactory connectionFactory, @Nullable String appId, String exchange,
071                        Function<LogEvent, String> routingKeyFunction, String connectionName, boolean declareExchange,
072                        String exchangeType) {
073                super();
074                this.uri = uri;
075                this.connectionFactory = connectionFactory;
076                this.appId = appId;
077                this.exchange = exchange;
078                this.routingKeyFunction = routingKeyFunction;
079                this.connectionName = connectionName;
080                this.declareExchange = declareExchange;
081                this.exchangeType = exchangeType;
082        }
083
084        /**
085         * Creates a RabbitMQOutput.
086         * @param name used to resolve config and give the output a name.
087         * @param uri passed to the rabbitmq connection factory.
088         * @param exchange exchange to send messages to.
089         * @param routingKey the logging event level will be used by default.
090         * @param declareExchange declare exchange on start. Default is false.
091         * @param host host.
092         * @param username set user name if not null outside of URI.
093         * @param password set password if not null outside of URI.
094         * @param port set port if not null.
095         * @param appId sets the message appId if not null.
096         * @param connectionName connection name if not null.
097         * @param exchangeType exchange type like "topic" covered in rabbitmq doc.
098         * @param virtualHost sets virtualhost if not null.
099         * @return output.
100         */
101        @LogConfigurable(prefix = LogProperties.OUTPUT_PREFIX)
102        static RabbitMQOutput of( //
103                        @LogConfigurable.KeyParameter String name, //
104                        @Nullable URI uri, //
105                        @LogConfigurable.DefaultParameter("DEFAULT_EXCHANGE") String exchange, //
106                        @LogConfigurable.ConvertParameter("toRoutingKeyFunction") @Nullable Function<LogEvent, String> routingKey, //
107                        @Nullable Boolean declareExchange, //
108                        @Nullable String host, //
109                        @Nullable String username, //
110                        @Nullable String password, //
111                        @Nullable Integer port, //
112                        @Nullable String appId, //
113                        @Nullable String connectionName, //
114                        @LogConfigurable.DefaultParameter("DEFAULT_EXCHANGE_TYPE") @Nullable String exchangeType, //
115                        @Nullable String virtualHost) {
116                connectionName = connectionName == null ? "rainbowgumOutput" : connectionName;
117                declareExchange = declareExchange == null ? false : declareExchange;
118                exchangeType = exchangeType == null ? DEFAULT_EXCHANGE_TYPE : exchangeType;
119                ConnectionFactory factory = new ConnectionFactory();
120                if (uri != null) {
121                        try {
122                                factory.setUri(uri);
123                        }
124                        catch (Exception e) {
125                                throw new RuntimeException(e);
126                        }
127                }
128                if (username != null) {
129                        factory.setUsername(username);
130                }
131                if (password != null) {
132                        factory.setPassword(password);
133                }
134                if (port != null) {
135                        factory.setPort(port);
136                }
137                if (host != null) {
138                        factory.setHost(host);
139                }
140                if (virtualHost != null) {
141                        factory.setVirtualHost(virtualHost);
142                }
143                Function<LogEvent, String> routingKeyFunction;
144                if (routingKey != null) {
145                        routingKeyFunction = routingKey;
146                }
147                else {
148                        routingKeyFunction = e -> e.level().name();
149                }
150                return new RabbitMQOutput(uri, factory, appId, exchange, routingKeyFunction, connectionName, declareExchange,
151                                exchangeType);
152        }
153
154        static Function<LogEvent, String> toRoutingKeyFunction(String routingKey) {
155                return e -> routingKey;
156        }
157
158        @Override
159        public void start(LogConfig config) {
160                lock.writeLock().lock();
161                try {
162                        this.connection = connectionFactory.newConnection(connectionName);
163                        if (declareExchange) {
164                                var channel = this.connection.createChannel();
165                                channel.exchangeDeclare(exchange, exchangeType);
166                        }
167                }
168                catch (IOException e) {
169                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
170                }
171                catch (TimeoutException e) {
172                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
173                }
174                finally {
175                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
176                }
177        }
178
179        @Override
180        public URI uri() {
181                return this.uri;
182        }
183
184        @Override
185        public void write(LogEvent event, byte[] bytes, int off, int len, ContentType contentType) {
186                // https://github.com/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-java-client/issues/422
187                byte[] copy = new byte[len];
188                System.arraycopy(bytes, off, copy, 0, len);
189                write(event, bytes, contentType);
190        }
191
192        @Override
193        public void write(LogEvent event, byte[] bytes, ContentType contentType) {
194                BasicProperties props = properties(event, contentType);
195                byte[] body = bytes;
196                try {
197                        var c = channel();
198                        c.basicPublish(exchange, routingKeyFunction.apply(event), props, body);
199                }
200                catch (IOException e) {
201                        MetaLog.error(RabbitMQOutput.class, e);
202                        lock.writeLock().lock();
203                        try {
204                                this.channel = null;
205                        }
206                        finally {
207                                lock.writeLock().unlock();
208                        }
209                }
210        }
211
212        private BasicProperties properties(LogEvent event, ContentType contentType) {
213                var builder = new BasicProperties.Builder().contentType(contentType.contentType()).appId(appId);
214                var kvs = event.keyValues();
215                if (!kvs.isEmpty()) {
216                        Map<String, Object> headers = new LinkedHashMap<>(kvs.size());
217                        kvs.forEach(headers::put);
218                        builder.headers(headers);
219                }
220                if (appId != null) {
221                        builder.appId(appId);
222                }
223                return builder.build();
224        }
225
226        Channel channel() throws IOException {
227                var c = this.channel;
228                if (c == null) {
229                        lock.writeLock().lock();
230                        try {
231                                c = this.channel = connection.createChannel();
232                                if (c == null) {
233                                        throw new IOException("channel is unavailable");
234                                }
235                                return c;
236                        }
237                        finally {
238                                lock.writeLock().unlock();
239                        }
240                }
241                return c;
242        }
243
244        @Override
245        public void flush() {
246
247        }
248
249        @Override
250        public WriteMethod writeMethod() {
251                return WriteMethod.BYTES;
252        }
253
254        @Override
255        public OutputType type() {
256                return OutputType.NETWORK;
257        }
258
259        @Override
260        public void close() {
261                lock.writeLock().lock();
262                try {
263                        var c = this.channel;
264                        var conn = this.connection;
265                        if (c != null) {
266                                try {
267                                        c.close();
268                                }
269                                catch (AlreadyClosedException ae) {
270                                        // do nothing.
271                                }
272                                catch (IOException | TimeoutException e) {
273                                        MetaLog.error(getClass(), e);
274                                }
275                        }
276                        if (conn != null) {
277                                try {
278                                        c.close();
279                                }
280                                catch (AlreadyClosedException ae) {
281                                        // do nothing.
282                                }
283                                catch (IOException | TimeoutException e) {
284                                        MetaLog.error(getClass(), e);
285                                }
286                        }
287                        this.channel = null;
288                        this.connection = null;
289                }
290                finally {
291                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
292                }
293
294        }
295
296}
